paragraphs.title: Categories of Data we Collect
paragraphs.textCondensed: In the scenario, absolutely no personal data is ever collected from you or processed. Hence, the GDPR and all its legal requirements donâ€™t apply to this app model.

paragraphs.title: Lawful Reasons for Data Processing
paragraphs.textCondensed: As our company does not collect or process any data in this scenario, it is unnecessary to look for a legal basis allowing the company to process personal data lawfully.

paragraphs.title: Security of Your Data
paragraphs.textCondensed: As our company does not collect nor hold any of your personal data in this scenario, data security issues are not relevant here.

paragraphs.title: Sale of Your data
paragraphs.textCondensed: As our company does not collect nor hold any of your personal data in this scenario, questions regarding the potential sale of your personal data are not relevant. Therefore, discussing the lawfulness of such a sale is irrelevant as well.

paragraphs.title: Your Rights over Your Personal Data
paragraphs.textCondensed: The GDPR does not apply in this scenario. Therefore, there are no special rights for the users to be mentioned in relation to the processing of their data, as our company is not processing any.
